issues.description: The UML diagram in the problem statement declares getNameAndTotalNumberOfStudents() as returning void, but the textual instructions (and the solution implementation) specify that it should return a String. This contradiction could confuse students about the correct return type to implement.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the UML entry for getNameAndTotalNumberOfStudents() in the problem statement to return String instead of void, so it matches the textual description and solution implementation.
